00007 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE( FP_CheckClose)
00008 {
00009         TestClass* t = new TestClass();
00010         FloatCondition<TestClass>* c1 = new FloatCondition<TestClass>(&TestClass::returnFP5,CLOSE,5.0f);
00011         c1->init(t);
00012         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(c1->execute(t),BT_SUCCESS);
00013         delete c1;
00014 
00015         FloatCondition<TestClass>* c2 = new FloatCondition<TestClass>(&TestClass::returnFP5,CLOSE,10.0f);
00016         c2->init(t);
00017         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(c2->execute(t),BT_FAILURE);
00018         delete c2;
00019         delete t;
00020 }
